timeline.bodyText: Fields are not allowed in tests. Can you please refactor and inline in a method that is called by both tests? You may need to inline TaskListener.NULL and launcher as well.
timeline.author: uhafner

timeline.bodyText: We are using AssertJ in the whole project.
timeline.author: uhafner

timeline.message: fix: converted MatrixBridgeTest to assertj and fields to a method
